医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究支持肾小球疾病患者接种 COVID-19 疫苗在 2,055 名患有多种肾小球疾病的成年人中，COVID-19 疫苗接种并未对肾功能产生不利影响或加重肾损伤，并且在该人群中似乎是安全的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Study-supports-vaccination-for-COVID-19-in-患者-with-glomerular-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Study-supports-vaccination-for-COVID-19-in-病人-with-glomerular-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c95e3e94-592c-4a26-ac82-d5873bd65231 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 22:15:07 -0400 Study supports vaccination for COVID-19 in patients with glomerular diseases
康奈尔大学生物学家揭示了人类社会行为差异的可能根源雄性果蝇通常不喜欢彼此。在社交方面，它们排斥雄性同伴，并对通过化学受体识别的雌性归零——至少科学家是这么认为的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Cornell-biologies-shine-light-on-the-possible-origin-of-differences-in- human-social-behaviors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Cornell-biologies-shine-light-on-the-possible-origin-of-differences-in- human-social-behaviors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1e60e8c-527b-4be4-938d-061cd1afdbd6 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 22:08:50 -0400 Cornell biologists shine light on the possible origin of differences in human social behaviors
药用植物能否成为扭转认知能力下降的关键？研究人员探索了现有证据，表明药用植物可能通过减少大脑炎症来帮助改善认知功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Could-medicinal-plants-be-the-key-to-reversing-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Could-medicinal-plants-be-the-key-to-reversing-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=788f74b3-1028-43c3-8ea5-ead6e419a311 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 21:59:00 -0400 Could medicinal plants be the key to reversing cognitive decline?
OHSU 科学家发现阿尔茨海默病和血管性痴呆细胞死亡的新途径研究人员发现了阿尔茨海默病和血管性痴呆中细胞死亡的新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/OHSU-scientists-discover-new-avenue-of-cell-death-in-Alzheimers-disease-and-angio-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/OHSU-scientists-discover-new-avenue-of-cell-death-in-Alzheimers-disease-and-angio-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6507b369-204d-42d4-a588-0911472f4b38 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 21:58:58 -0400 OHSU scientists discover new avenue of cell death in Alzheimer's disease and vascular dementia
新共识声明为 mCRPC 患者使用 177Lu-PSMA 放射性核素治疗提供指导核医学和分子影像学会 (SNMMI) 发布了一份新的共识声明，为接受 177Lu-PSMA 放射性核素治疗的转移性去势抵抗性前列腺癌 (mCRPC) 患者的选择和管理提供标准化指导。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/New-consensus-statement-provides-guidance-for-use-of-177Lu-PSMA-radionuclide-therapy-in-mCRPC-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/New-consensus-statement-provides-guidance-for-use-of-177Lu-PSMA-radionuclide-therapy-in-mCRPC-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=955fc8ba-57ce-4072-898d-8e0b12168ef7 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 21:51:59 -0400 New consensus statement provides guidance for use of 177Lu-PSMA radionuclide therapy in mCRPC patients
SARS-CoV-2 可以感染家禽吗？ 《病毒学杂志》的新研究表明，鸡可能成为新出现的 SARS-CoV-2 变种的中间宿主，对公共健康构成潜在威胁。该研究确定鸡体内的 AXL 和 ACE2 受体可能是病毒的结合位点，强调需要进一步研究和采取预防措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Can-SARS-CoV-2-infect-poultry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Can-SARS-CoV-2-infect-poultry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=078e6fe7-e40e-4bc7-b3b5-bbc6d6c0cbf3 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 21:47:00 -0400 Can SARS-CoV-2 infect poultry?
与传统血液稀释剂相比，DOAC 的使用可降低痴呆风险与传统血液稀释剂（如华法林）相比，房颤患者（尤其是亚洲患者）使用直接口服抗凝剂（DOAC）可降低痴呆风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/DOAC-use-linked-with-reduction-in-dementia-risk-compared-to-traditional-blood-thinners.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/DOAC-use-linked-with-reduction-in-dementia-risk-compared-to-traditional-blood-thinners.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d35a0036-0250-46e1-a3c8-2b34459450d1 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 21:41:49 -0400 DOAC use associated with reduction in dementia risk compared to traditional blood thinners
无糖汽水会欺骗你的唾液：研究揭示加糖饮料如何影响口腔酶和胰岛素水平该研究调查了加糖饮料对健康年轻人唾液胰岛素、阿斯巴甜和 α-淀粉酶水平的影响。研究发现，与加糖水相比，低糖软饮料会导致唾液中阿斯巴甜和胰岛素水平更高，这引发了人们对人工甜味剂对代谢过程影响的质疑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Diet-sodas-trick-your-saliva-Study-reveals-how-sweetened-drinks-impact-oral-enzymes-and-insulin-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Diet-sodas-trick-your-saliva-Study-reveals-how-sweetened-drinks-impact-oral-enzymes-and-insulin-levels.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=357faed9-8ae9-451f-9b5a-8e0f69ea40f8 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 21:37:00 -0400 Diet sodas trick your saliva: Study reveals how sweetened drinks impact oral enzymes and insulin levels
免费在线工具可能会减轻一些前列腺癌患者的经济负担一项新的研究发现，免费的在线工具可能会为一些前列腺癌患者节省超过 9,000 美元的自付费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Free-online-tool-could-pottially-mitigate-financial-toothity-for-some-prostate-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Free-online-tool-could-pottially-mitigate-financial-toothity-for-some-prostate-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05b6224f-f3e5-40bd-9529-5404f78a9b82 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 21:32:14 -0400 Free online tool could potentially mitigate financial toxicity for some prostate cancer patients
科学家开发新技术研究糖对免疫细胞的影响每个人都喜欢甜食，甚至我们的细胞也是如此。虽然我们通常认为糖是饮食中为我们提供能量的组成部分，但糖在指导细胞活动方面也非常重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Scientists-develop-new-technique-to-study-sugars-on-immune-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Scientists-develop-new-technique-to-study-sugars-on-immune-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfcc0ab2-70d0-4ffd-8e1a-c10c70699a0a Tue, 05 Sep 2023 21:24:44 -0400 Scientists develop new technique to study sugars on immune cells
